author: taylor
msg: The servlet container provides a temp directory for things like jsp
compilation etc.  I propose Jetspeed be configurable to use this location
for all filewriting activity if desired.  I've included a diff for a change
to the JetspeedDiskCache.java implementation to support this functionality
for the Disk Cache if the JetspeedResources.properties entry
'cache.directory' is either missing entirely or equal to null.

author: taylor
msg: - added new portlet entry 'ServletContextPortlet' from Todd Kuebler

author: taylor
msg: Fixed bug in JetspeedDBSecurityService to honor forced upper and lower case settings on usernames in the auto-disable feature

author: taylor
msg: patch from Tom Whitehill to fix hardcoded /jetspeed/portal bug in AdminInfo portlet
